title: Continuum Mechanics Applied to Medicine/Biology
description: Introduction to the basic definitions of continuum mechanics and their mathematical formulation at the graduate level with applications to problems in medicine and biology. Prerequisites: (BENG 226 or MAE 201 or MAE 210A) and (BENG 227 or MAE 201 or MAE 210A) and (BENG 221 or MAE 208). (S)
